source.query: SELECT SalesOrderID as sales_order_id , cast(OrderDate as char) as order_date , cast(DueDate as char) as due_date , cast(ShipDate as char) as ship_date , Status as status , OnlineOrderFlag as online_order_flag , CustomerID as customer_id , TerritoryID as territory_id , ShipMethodID as ship_method_id , CurrencyRateID as currency_rate_id , cast(ModifiedDate as char) as modified_date FROM salesorderheader Where ModifiedDate > '${last_modified_date}'
